csv_reader module¶

csv_reader.address_registry_cvs_to_hashtable()[source]¶

This method converts entries from csv file, then creates a Destination objects from those entries and append them to a list. The runtime is O(n).

Returns

address_list – List of Destination objects

Return type

list

csv_reader.convert_address_id_to_address(address_id)[source]¶

It converts an address id and return the address. The Runtime of this method is O(1).

Parameters

address_id (int) – The address ID that needs to be converted into the address

Returns

address – the address

Return type

str

csv_reader.convert_address_to_id(address)[source]¶

It converts an address and return the address ID. The Runtime of this method is O(n).

Parameters

address (str) – The address that needs to be converted into a ID

Returns

destination_id – The id of the address that was passed

Return type

str

csv_reader.convert_cvs_to_hashtable()[source]¶

This method converts entries from csv file, then creates a package objects from those entries and insert them into a hashtable. The runtime is O(n).

Returns

hash_table – A hash table that consist of package objects

Return type

hashtable

csv_reader.distance_csv_to_hashtable()[source]¶

This method converts entries from csv file, then creates a Destination objects from those entries and append them to a list. The runtime is O(n).

Returns

address_list – List of Destination objects

Return type

list

csv_reader.distance_lookup(from_location, to_location)[source]¶

Looks up the distance between location.

Parameters

  • from_location (int) – the start location

  • to_location (int) – the end location

Returns

distance – the distance between the two location

Return type

str
